mapper.insert: insert into jeju_member(id, grade, pw, name, email, tell, businessNo) values(#{id}, #{grade} , #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{tell}, #{businessNo});
mapper.select: select id,pw from jeju_member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.update: update jeju_member set name = #{name}, email = #{email}, tell = #{tell} where id = #{id};
update jeju_member set pw = #{pw} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from jeju_member where name = #{name} and tell = #{tell};
select pw from jeju_member where id = #{id} and name = #{name} and tell = #{tell};
mapper.update: update jeju_member set hno = #{hno} where id = #{id}
